description: Devin Noonan becomes distracted by his two German Shepards while watering cannabis plants in his greenhouse just outside Augusta, Maine. (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)
Noonan said tending to his marijuana greenhouse is a lot of work. He grows indoor and outdoor marijuana. (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)
Noonan pulls back the leaves on his cannabis plant to determine if the plant is a female. (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)
Noonan grows 72 plants in his medical marijuana grow operation in Maine, which require daily watering. (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)
Noonan, 26, has been cultivating cannabis plants for two years in his backyard just outside of Augusta, Maine. (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)
Noonan moves cannabis plants from his unfinished greenhouse to the surrounding grassy fields. He's been working on the operation for more than a month.  (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)
Noonan prepares several indoor cannabis plants for transport to his outdoor grow.  (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)
Noonan also grows cannabis plants inside his home, eventually shifting them to his outdoor grow. (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)
Noonan's German Shepard, Jack, waits patiently outside the indoor grow room of Noonan's Maine home. (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)
Noonan lets Zeus, one of two German Shepards he owns, roam outside before he extracts hash oil from his cannabis plants.  (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)
